name: Food
description: Expenses for groceries and dining out

name: Transportation
description: Public transport, fuel, and other travel expenses

name: Housing
description: Rent, mortgage, and home maintenance costs

name: Utilities
description: Electricity, water, gas, and other utility bills

name: Entertainment
description: Leisure activities such as movies, concerts, and subscriptions

name: Education
description: Tuition fees, courses, books, and learning materials

name: Clothing
description: Expenses on clothes, shoes, and accessories

name: Savings
description: Money set aside for future use or emergencies

name: Miscellaneous
description: Other expenses that don't fit into the defined categories
